Articles.Content: I threw this name together, and i don't really like it. however i have no other ideas. please give input.
What are some of your interests? Think about that, and then you can come up with a good one based off of that.

Make a name that's giving you hope (especially about rocket science or whatever you like). For me, my name was based from anime character, but can also be repurposed as abbreviation of space program-related stuff:

ARS: advanced rocket system

ARS: advanced reusable shuttle

ARS: absurdly robust spaceplane

And of course...

ARS: absolute (or absurd) rocket science!

Edited May 9, 2017 by ARS
